title: Ayurveda as Spiritual Practice - Diet and Lifestyle
description: Further Training For Yoga Teachers posted by Soma Medicine Yoga School on Yoga Alliance Professionals.
cleaned_text: In this online training, you will learn how to consider Ayurveda as a lifestyle.
